categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: Pawel was a tall male of unidentified species. This person was seen in Depatar, the City of Masks, in 31 BBY. Like all the visitors and many inhabitants, this person was in disguise, particularly covered in shiny feathers with a great tail-fan. As his voice was higher than usual in a male, it was believed he used electronic modification for it.
